name: Dice Defense (imoabura)
description:
Dice Defense is my GTMK Game Jam 2022 entry. In Dice Defense, you must survive as many waves of enemies as possible by throwing dice on top of them.

Each Dice has 3 unique symbols on it representing: Fire, Ice, Stone.

The result of the Dice will add a Dice of that Type to your arsenal.

Fire Dice deal extra damage.

Ice Dice slows down enemies.

Stone Dice spawns temporary obstacles.

Controls:

Left-Click and Release to Throw Dice.
